title: #39: Brad Evarts - Daddy's In The House, Psychos, Branding, Relationship Advice
itunes:title: #39: Brad Evarts - Daddy's In The House, Psychos, Branding, Relationship Advice
description:
Entrepreneur, businessman, branding expert, and restaurateur Brad Evarts - who also happens to be Lauryn's father, joins Michael & Lauryn to discuss psychos, branding, building a business in 2016, and the importance of acting "child-like" in a relationship.

To connect with Lauryn click HERE
